class.name: Marshalls
class.description: Provides data transformation and encoding utility functions.

method.name: base64_to_raw
method.description: Return [PoolByteArray] of a given base64 encoded String.

method.name: base64_to_utf8
method.description: Return utf8 String of a given base64 encoded String.

method.name: base64_to_variant
method.description: Return [Variant] of a given base64 encoded String.

method.name: raw_to_base64
method.description: Return base64 encoded String of a given [PoolByteArray].

method.name: utf8_to_base64
method.description: Return base64 encoded String of a given utf8 String.

method.name: variant_to_base64
method.description: Return base64 encoded String of a given [Variant].
